report.title: EU Pollinator Transects Samples
report.description: Sample download for EU Pollinator transects. Contains all child section samples, along with a selection of parent sample columns.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.id = s.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id JOIN locations transect on transect.id = s.location_id AND transect.location_type_id = #transect_location_type_id# AND transect.deleted = false JOIN locations mvs_sites on mvs_sites.id = transect.parent_id AND mvs_sites.location_type_id = #mvs_square_location_type_id# AND mvs_sites.deleted = false JOIN location_attribute_values country_code_attr_val on country_code_attr_val.location_id = mvs_sites.id AND country_code_attr_val.location_attribute_id = #country_code_loc_attr_id# AND country_code_attr_val.deleted = false JOIN locations country on country.code = country_code_attr_val.text_value AND country.location_type_id = #country_location_type_id# AND country.deleted = false LEFT JOIN samples s_section on s_section.parent_id = s.id AND s_section.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional s_section_nonfunct on s_section_nonfunct.id = s_section.id WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND s.survey_id = #survey_id# AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR s.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR s.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date)))

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Survey ID to limit results to.

param.name: start_time_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the start time.

param.name: end_time_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the end time.

param.name: wind_direction_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the wind direction.

param.name: wind_speed_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the wind speed.

param.name: temperature_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the temperature.

param.name: sun_percentage_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds sun percentage.

param.name: cloud_percentage_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds cloud percentage.

param.name: year_sort_order
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: country_code_loc_attr_id
param.description: ID of the location attribute that holds the country code for an MVS location.

param.name: transect_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for transects.

param.name: mvs_square_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for MVS Squares.

param.name: country_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for countries.
